name: Lucario
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: They can detect the species of a living being—and its emotions—from over half a mile away. They control auras and hunt their prey in packs.

abilities.name: Precognitive Aura
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Garchomp in play, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Missile Jab
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.
